description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Dominate the board with the card! AXEH  is a new style game that is board game with flavor of card game. Read the next move of the opponent., and make full use  the card to neutralize enemy castle ! You can play with various of AI to grow your skills at solo-mode. Of course, also supports online matches of XBOXLIVE!
